title: Green Dragonborn
content:
ded from an empire that strove for world domination. They are draconic in appearance, with leathery scales, clawed hands and paws, and red or gold eyes. Dragonborn value honor, excellence, and mastery of their abilities. They have abilities such as breathing acidic, freezing, flaming, electrical, or poisonous blasts. In addition, they are supported by the warlord, fighter, and paladin classes. Dragonborn seek out adventures to prove their worth and achieve perpetual glory.

Green Dragonborn Phys
